item.title: 3. Child Language Acquisition
item.description: I have been actively involved in other projects on child language development. I have written a book on child language acquisition with Dr. Jieun Kiaer at the University of Oxford, which was published in 2019 by a highly prestigious publishing house of South Korea, Science Books. While writing this monograph, I became more interested in broader issues on language development and multilingualism. I am collaborating with researchers at Seoul National University and Dr.
